name: Emanuel GARDNER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Gardner v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

judges: MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
parties: Emanuel GARDNER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 1995, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby affirmed.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Rule of Judicial Administration 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
668 A.2d 135
Emanuel GARDNER, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 1995.
